dmca.title: Jewelers Complain of "Loving Family" Pendant Copyright Infringement (#1)
dmca.body:
Sir or Madam:

	Our picture copyrights are being infringed upon. [Private] has been notified several times about this problem both via email and telephone messages from our company however she has never responded as of this date. We were finally able to speak with her on July 3d, 2003 only by blocking our telephone number. On that date she agreed to remove all of our pictures from her web sites within 24 to 48 hours. While she did remove many of them, she or someone in her business actually had the audacity to replace one of our pictures with a new picture we added on July 2nd which she simply copied and cropped for her own use. ([Private] indicates that they are now using their pictures which, they stated to us on the telephone, were not authorized.) Three of our pictures still remain on her web sites and this is unacceptable. A separate enclosed page Indicates [sic] your search engine listings with the offending addresses.

[private]		Our attorney also indicates the following
Love0urBaby.com		address and contact information:
All4Moms.com		[private]
[private] Road, Suite 165	[private] Ct.
Raleigh, NO 27613	Raleigh, NO 27613-5642
[private] AND [private]		[private]@nc.rr.com

	MY PICTURES THAT ARE BEING USED WITHOUT OUR AUTHORIZATION ARE SHOWN HERE...

[Images]

	This is blatant and willful infringement. We request that these web pages be promptly removed until she complies with the removal of all of our pictures from these web pages. Please contact us if you need additional information.

Sincerely,

[private]
Pomeroy Jewelers

<hr>

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials pictured on the pages indicated on the enclosure listed web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. I swear under penalty of perjury that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[signature]

07-25-03
Date

--------

By signing this statement, I certify that I am the author and copyright owner of the pictures shown below and that I have not authorized [Private], All4Moms.com. LoveOurBaby.com or any other business or individual to use my pictures.

	MY PICTURES THAT ARE BEING USED WITHOUT OUR AUTHORIZATION ARE SHOWN HERE...
